description: This file defines the EcsContainer class, which models an ECS container configuration in AWS, including methods to generate container definitions and build environment variables, with dependencies on AWS SDK and secret management modules.

classes.name: EcsContainer
classes.description: Represents an AWS ECS container configuration with properties for container settings and methods to generate container definitions and environment variables.

methods.name: get_container_definition
methods.description: Generates a dictionary representing the container's configuration for ECS, including environment variables and other settings.

methods.name: build_container_environment
methods.description: Constructs the list of environment variables for the container, resolving references and secrets as needed.
